title.rendered: ClinLab Staffing Marks 3rd Year of Growth

content.rendered:
ClinLab Scientific Staffing & Recruiting, the premier east coast scientific staffing & executive search firm, is pleased to announce that 2016 marked the third consecutive year of significant growth for the company. By providing outstanding service to our clients and talent, the firm has grown 155% since 2014 and has strong growth drivers in place to keep that momentum going into and beyond 2017.

“Given our knowledge of the staffing industry, we’ve built a company that we believe solves real day-to-day problems for organizations that rely on qualified scientific talent. The rapid market changes we’ve seen over the past years have proven that there’s definitely is a real need for flexible staffing,” said Andrius Montvila, ClinLab Staffing CEO. “Having established a strong client base, it’s clear that many companies are looking for new, more efficient and effective ways to discover and hire staff. Our U.S. growth is a testament to that.”

ClinLab Staffing is a leader in the scientific staffing & executive search industry. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, ClinLab is committed to driving workforce solutions for startup, mid-sized and large biotech, medical and scientific companies. With an unrivaled network, a deep expertise and broad market intelligence, our team of seasoned client managers and recruiters are uniquely positioned to provide industry-leading services and support. For more information, please visit Contact ClinLab Staffing.
